mapper.select: select name, email, password, fail_password, age, gender, cre_date AS creDate, last_date AS lastDate, total_reply AS todayReply, business_id AS businessId, image_info_id AS imageInfoId from user where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
select count(*) from user where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into user(name, email, password, fail_password, age, gender, cre_date, image_info_id) values(#{name},#{email},#{password}, 0, #{age},#{gender}, NOW(), 1);
insert into company(name, type, discription, address, number, url, state, time) values(#{name}, #{type}, #{discription}, #{address}, #{number}, #{url}, #{state}, #{time})
insert into user (name, email, password, fail_password, age, gender, cre_date, business_id) values(#{name},#{email},#{password}, 0, #{age},#{gender}, NOW(), LAST_INSERT_ID())
